## Use video with the Framer API on your canvas.
A video player that uses the latest Framer API. 
â€”

## Options
- Load File
- URL
- Youtube (in progress)
- Vimeo
- Loop
- Autoplay

## Vimeo
Add Vimeo url number for your video. 
Ex: vimeo.com/  317838554 <- copy this number 
## Youtube
Add Youtube url ID for your video. 
Ex:  youtube.com/watch?v=  8Hoe9by0wNc <- copy this id
####Built with Framer Lib 1.0.8
